Text: You just made my wife's Christmas!  Cheers!

Thx from West Virginia, TvTeam - Sincerely appreciated as always! Thanks too to all you yuletidey seeders and leechers out there - Thx for making it happen!

If anyone is planning on slapping this on a disc for a family member or something, here's a seed from thetorrentlord to fill up the wasted space (the cast together on a talk show)... Call it a bonus feature:

Thx all - hope whatever holidays you celebrate (inc just being off work) are good ones

Thank you and Happy Holidays! :D
